trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Delhi Charter Township
There were no other sightings in Delhi Charter Township on or around July 29th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsRiding bike south, I only noticed it because it had NO blinking lights like a normal aircraft would and was traveling slightly faster then than an airplane would, also made no sound. the color was not white but was not yellow either, in less than a minute it was out of sight.
Summary: Steady white light NO airplane lights
